What is the main difference between a for loop and a while loop in 
JavaScript?
test-question.options:
A for loop is used for iterating over a specific number of times while a while loop continues to execute until a specific condition is met., 
A for loop is only used for iterating over arrays while a while loop can be used for any type of iteration.,
A for loop is executed in a single line of code while a while loop requires multiple lines of code.,
A for loop is executed only once while a while loop continues to execute until it is manually stopped.
